name: Help! I Set Off a Bomb!
name_original: Help! I Set Off a Bomb!
description:
Your friend has built a dangerously powerful time machine. You must use it to go back in time to save his life (and the universe). Fortunately, you know how to press buttons really fast. Unfortunately, you can only go back in time by 60 seconds at a time, and he died 5 minutes ago.

Instructions:
1. Do whatever the command prompt says
2. Do it in the order the command prompt says
3. Don't let the commands pile up
4. Don't run out of time
5. And for the love of god. . .don't forget to pump the Time Pressure up or you'll go blind

Should be a piece of cake!

Credits:

Art by Max Lama

Programmed by Max Mitchell

Music by Max Mitchell

Created for Ludum Dare Fall 2020 Game Jam
